channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro: Latest Special Offers Slash Prices
item.description: Apple’s iPhone 16 Pro is seeing steep discounts right now, and this is a phone you can’t buy directly from Apple.

item.title: Home Assistant’s New Zigbee And Thread Dongle Goes Live
item.description: The Home Assistant Connect ZBT-2 has been officially launched by the Open Home Foundation

item.title: Samsung’s New Special Offer To Galaxy S25 Ultra Buyers
item.description: Samsung's new Galaxy S25 Ultra Black Friday deal just dropped the phone to £849. But beware: a lower price already came and went. Find out if you shou...

item.title: Semeru Volcano Erupts In Indonesia, Spewing Powerful Pyroclastic Flows
item.description: Semeru volcano — the highest volcano on Java — erupted on the afternoon of November 19, 2025, with pyroclastic flows racing at high speed down its slo...

item.title: ‘Neon Inferno’ Review: ‘Contra’ Goes Cyberpunk In This Retro Epic
item.description: This incredible cyberpunk-style run 'n' gun shooter is dripping with style and excellent mechanics that make the classic genre feel new again.
